definitions.definition: To forcibly seize control of some vehicle in order to rob it or to reach a destination (especially an airplane , truck or a boat ).
To seize control of some process or resource to achieve a purpose other than its originally intended one.
To introduce an amendment deleting the contents of a bill and inserting entirely new provisions .

main_definition: To forcibly seize control of some vehicle in order to rob it or to reach a destination (especially an airplane , truck or a boat ).
secondary_definitions: To seize control of some process or resource to achieve a purpose other than its originally intended one.
( politics ) To introduce an amendment deleting the contents of a bill and inserting entirely new provisions .
